name: Linker
short_description:
Every project needs some common utilities which are often coded again and again in each and every project. Several other utilities libraries are availbale in open source and the developers would need to pick and choose which features they would want from each library. 

However, this library contains the most basic utilities for various needs ranging from XML parsing and XML signatures, Password Hashing and checksums, functions and predicates, Closing resources and invoking System Commands, reflex and regex, etc.
summary: A Java class library providing utility classes for most common needs
